article_node.title: Watch this awesome boost-back burn on a returning SpaceX rocket
article_node.summary: SpaceX successfully launched an unmanned robotic spaceplane for the U.S. Space Force in the USSF-36 mission using a Falcon 9 rocket from Kennedy Space Center. The launch featured a spectacular night display and marked the eighth flight of NASA's X-37B Orbital Test Vehicle. Additionally, SpaceX is preparing for two significant launches on Sunday, including the 10th flight of its Starship rocket and a commercial resupply mission to the International Space Station.
